text:
A blush of pink, a gentle grace,
Unfurling slow in time and space.
Petals soft, a silken hue,
Kissed by dawn, with morning dew.

Each layer holds a whispered sigh,
Of sunlit days and clear blue sky.
A heart of rose, so sweetly deep,
Where secrets bloom and softly sleep.

On verdant stem, it stands alone,
A fragile beauty, freshly shown.
A silent promise, soft and light,
Of beauty's reign, in purest might.
